tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE public_transport (
  vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
  location_lat FLOAT,
  location_long FLOAT,
  status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE public_transport_vehicles (vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
current_location VARCHAR(100),
status VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE vehicle_statuses (vehicle_id INT,
status_update_datetime TIMESTAMP,
status VARCHAR(50),
PRIMARY KEY (vehicle_id, status_update_datetime));

CREATE TABLE VehicleLocation ( 
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    location_lat FLOAT NOT NULL, 
    location_long FLOAT NOT NULL, 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE VehicleStatus ( 
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    last_updated TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE RouteSchedule ( 
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    vehicle_id INT NOT NULL, 
    departure_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, 
    arrival_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE vehicle ( 
   vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
   vehicle_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
   route_id INT NOT NULL, 
   last_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
   last_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL 
 );

CREATE TABLE public_transport_vehicles (
  vehicle_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  location_lat DOUBLE PRECISION NOT NULL,
  location_long DOUBLE PRECISION NOT NULL,
  status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE vehicle_routes (
  route_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  route_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  route_description TEXT,
  start_location VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  end_location VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE vehicle_schedule (
  schedule_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id UUID NOT NULL,
  route_id UUID NOT NULL,
  departure_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  arrival_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE vehicle_status_logs (
  log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id UUID NOT NULL,
  status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  log_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE vehicle_alerts (
  alert_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id UUID NOT NULL,
  alert_message TEXT NOT NULL,
  alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
